modules.name: Acl
modules.description: Acl is part of the Store Administration functionality. With this module you will define roles, groups, privileges and resources for managing access privileges to Zed Administration Interface.

module_versions.description:
Included commits: https://github.com/spryker/acl/compare/3.14.0...3.15.0

### Improvements

- Added `UserFacade::getUserCollection()` to dependencies.
- Removed `UserFacade::getUserByUsername()` from dependencies.
- Introduced `UserCollection` transfer.
- Introduced `UserConditions` transfer.
- Introduced `UserCriteria` transfer.
- Increased `User` module version dependency.
- Increased `Transfer` module version dependency.

Included commits: https://github.com/spryker/acl/compare/3.13.0...3.14.0

### Improvements

- Adjusted `Spryker\Zed\Acl\Communication\Plugin\EventDispatcher\AccessControlEventDispatcherPlugin` for compatibility with Symfony 6.

Included commits: https://github.com/spryker/acl-data-import/tree/0.1.0

### Initial Release

- Introduced `AclGroupDataImportPlugin` plugin to import Acl Group data to `spy_acl_group` table.
- Introduced `AclGroupRoleDataImportPlugin ` plugin to
to import Acl Group Role data to `spy_acl_groups_has_roles` table.
- Introduced `AclRoleDataImportPlugin ` plugin to import Acl Role data to `spy_acl_role` table.
- Introduced `AclDataImportFacade::importAclRoles()`.
- Introduced `AclDataImportFacade::importAclGroups()`.
- Introduced `AclDataImportFacade::importAclGroupRole()`.
- Introduced `AclDataImportConfig::getAclRoleDataImporterConfiguration()`.
- Introduced `AclDataImportConfig::getAclGroupDataImporterConfiguration()`.
- Introduced `AclDataImportConfig::getAclGroupRoleDataImporterConfiguration()`.
- Introduced `Role` transfer.
- Introduced `Role.reference` transfer property.
- Introduced `RoleCriteria ` transfer.
- Introduced `RoleCriteria.reference` transfer property.
- Introduced `GroupCriteria` transfer.
- Introduced `GroupCriteria.names` transfer property.
